title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2348/2001 of 30 November 2001 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2921/90 on aid for the production of casein and caseinates from skimmed milk
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 2348/2001
of 30 November 2001
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2921/90 on aid for the production of casein and caseinates from skimmed milk
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1255/1999 of 17 May 1999 on the common organisation of the market in milk and milk products(1), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1670/2000(2), and in particular Article 15 thereof,
Whereas:
(1) Article 2(1) of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2921/90(3), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1335/2001(4), sets the aid for skimmed milk processed into casein or caseinates. Given the market trend for these products and that for skimmed milk powder the aid should be decreased.
(2) The Management Committee for Milk and Milk Products has not delivered an opinion within the time limit set by its Chairman,
main_body: In Article 2(1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2921/90 "EUR 3,80" is replaced by "EUR 3,20".

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 November 2001.
For the Commission
Franz Fischler
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 160, 26.6.1999, p. 48.
(2) OJ L 193, 29.7.2000, p. 10.
(3) OJ L 279, 11.10.1990, p. 22.
(4) OJ L 180, 3.7.2001, p. 20.
